      • messageCopy

        public static boolean messageCopy(java.nio.ByteBuffer original,
                                  int startOffset,
                                  int nth,
                                  java.nio.ByteBuffer dest,
                                  int destOffset,
                                  SBEMessageSchema schema)
        Copy a message to a byte buffer
        Parameters:
        original - the original message buffer
        startOffset - the start offset of the first message
        nth - nth message in this byte array. Starts from zero for the first message.
        dest - the destination buffer
        destOffset - the start position in the destination buffer
        schema - schema to parse this message
        Returns:
        true if copy is successful

      • messageCopy

        public static boolean messageCopy(java.nio.ByteBuffer original,
                                  int startOffset,
                                  int nth,
                                  byte[] dest,
                                  int destOffset,
                                  SBEMessageSchema schema)
        Copy a SBE message to a byte array
        Parameters:
        original - a buffer containing one or more SBE messages
        startOffset - the start offset of the first message
        nth - nth message in this byte array. Starts from zero for the first message.
        dest - the destination buffer
        destOffset - the start position in the destination buffer
        schema - schema to parse this message
        Returns:
        true if copy is successful

        dest - the destination buffer
        destOffset - the start position in the destination buffer

        true if copy is successful

        Returns:
        the Json representation of the GroupObject

      • toJsonString

        public static java.lang.String toJsonString(GroupObject obj,
                                            java.lang.String encodingType)
                                     throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Create a Json expression for a GroupObject, including all of the nested subgroups.
        Parameters:
        obj - the GroupObject
        encodingType - the encoding type to convert a byte array into a String
        Returns:
        the Json representation of the GroupObject
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - if the encoding type is undefined or not supported
